awd_abstract_narration: 9422982  Pinkerton      The University of Wisconsin Madison is extending WiscNet at 56  kbps to 17 Wisconsin institutions, comprising seven independent  colleges and ten units of the Wisconsin Technical College system.   The 17 schools are:    Alverno College                    Mid-State Technical College  Bellin College of Nursing          Milwaukee Area Technical  College  Blackhawk Technical College        Mount Mary College  College of the Menominee Nation    Nicolet Area Technical College  Fox Valley Technical College       Northcentral Technical College  Gateway Technical College          Northeast Technical College  Lakeland College                   Silver Lake College  Lakeshore Technical College        Wisconsin Indianhead Technical  Marian College of Fond du Lac           College    Faculty and students will benefit from access to the resources of  the Internet, including libraries and supercomputers.  In  addition, they will be able to communicate and collaborate with  colleagues at other institutions in pursuit of research and  educational projects.  The award provides partial support of the  project for two years.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
